analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x268f39ebb4868a09fa654d4ffe1ab024bc937db2.sol:
	Contract DNACoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x268f39ebb4868a09fa654d4ffe1ab024bc937db2.sol#316-317)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
